page.title: 02The Village Butcher
page.content: Mr.Larry Cable owns a butcher's shop in Walmer Bridge. Mr.Cable has been a butcher for seventeen years.No other member of his family had been involved in the trade. Mr.Cable and his family live above their shop.The building is over a hundred years old. The shop opens at 8.30a.m. and closes at 6.00p.m. It is closed on Sundays.Mr.Cable has three people who come to work with him in the shop.The busiest period of the year is Christmas when long hours are worked to satisfy orders. Mr.Cable's main competition is from the local supermarket but he has the advantage of all his meat being freshly killed.His shop sells other products such as cheese and tinned goods. He plans to expand his business over the next few years. (Nicholas Cable)
